suggested_lap.title: Ready to review data!
suggested_lap.text:
We've selected the best lap and a suggested channel to get you started.

To add more, touch the gear icon for a list of available channels.

beta_analysis_welcome.title: Beta Analysis
beta_analysis_welcome.text:
To get started, import a log file using the (+) icon to the right. You can also download some example logfiles from our support forums.

BETA feature: prepare for significant improvements, which may require re-importing your data.
